Use Solar Power: Solar power is a renewable energy source that can be harnessed using solar panels. With the help of solar panels, you can generate electricity and use it to power your home.
Use Wind Power: Wind turbines can be used to generate electricity by harnessing the power of the wind. You can install a small wind turbine in your backyard and use it to generate electricity.
Use Battery Power: You can store electricity in batteries and use it to power your home. You can charge the batteries using solar panels or wind turbines.

Use Biomass Power: Biomass power is a renewable energy source that can be generated by burning organic matter such as wood, agricultural waste, and municipal waste. You can use biomass to generate electricity.

Use Hydroelectric Power: Hydroelectric power is a renewable energy source that can be generated by harnessing the power of moving water. You can install a small hydroelectric turbine in a nearby stream or river and use it to generate electricity.
